long_description: Pure, wild salmon and a touch of sea salt-nothing more. SeaBear Ready-To-Eat wild salmon is a special treat that's great for all occasions! Distinctive in its natural red color, robust flavor and tender flakiness, sockeye offers a quintessential Northwest eating experience. No refrigeration is needed until the vacuum-sealed pouch is opened. Sockeye salmon is known for its high levels of beneficial fats and oils--get natural heart-health support from Omega-3 fatty acids. Serve with crackers, a loaf of crusty bread, tossed in salad, crumbled over pasta, mixed with cream cheese or even added to scrambled eggs or omelets. SeaBear Ready-To-Eat wild salmon is certified Kosher. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Pure, wild salmon and a touch of sea salt-nothing more. SeaBear Ready-To-Eat wild salmon is a special treat that's great for all occasions!
